subject: p14727722
History: New hypotension. Rigors. Rule out pneumonia.
Findings: Portable AP semi-upright chest radiograph shows decreased degree of inspiration compared to recent prior studies. Taking this into consideration, no focal parenchymal consolidation is seen to suggest new pneumonia. The heart and mediastinal structures and bony structures are unremarkable. Positioning of right-sided PICC line is unchanged.
